attributes.action: Stop Uber coming to our disricts
attributes.additional_details: Councils should stand by us taxi drivers that pay councils  revenue
attributes.background: I am a taxi driver in a lovely town that Uber has now invaded our local taxi drivers are all suffering

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for deciding which taxi and private hire companies are licensed. Those decisions are taken by local elected bodies, usually local councils. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
